class_notes: (Prerequisite: MTS 520G/M/T or MTS 520G/M/Tb) (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions are Wednesdays 3:00pm-5:00pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via online asynchronous engagement)
course_description: Prerequisite: MTS520T. (Faculty) Students concentrating in History, Scripture, and Tradition are required to complete this capstone course during their final or graduating semester. A component of the capstone course is the completion of an Integrative Paper or the MTS thesis (which may be taken for additional credit by enrolling in MTS502).
sections: Class Nbr: 5121, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 3-5p, Instructor: A. Greene, Status: Open
